content: **drops crochet basque hat and scarf with shell pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the doce de coco scarf pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **note** yardage includes enough for matching scarf **materials** drops snow 300 g colour no 01 off-white drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l/11 or size needed to obtain 9 treble_crochet us = width 10 cm / 4 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/109-49-b---doce-de-coco-scarf
